Uses of Package
org.opendaylight.controller.forwardingrulesmanager

  • Packages that use org.opendaylight.controller.forwardingrulesmanager 
    Package Description

  • Classes in org.opendaylight.controller.forwardingrulesmanager used by org.opendaylight.controller.flowprogrammer.northbound 
    Class and Description
    FlowConfig
    Configuration Java Object which represents a flow configuration information for Forwarding Rules Manager.
  • Classes in org.opendaylight.controller.forwardingrulesmanager used by org.opendaylight.controller.forwardingrulesmanager 
    Class and Description
    FlowConfig
    Configuration Java Object which represents a flow configuration information for Forwarding Rules Manager.
    FlowEntry
    Represents a flow applications request Forwarding Rules Manager to install on a network node.
    PortGroup
    PortGroup is a simple data-structure to represent any arbitrary group of ports on a Switch (that is represented using its switch-ID).
    PortGroupChangeListener
    PortGroupChangeListener listens to the PortGroup updates provided by the PortGroupProvider.
    PortGroupConfig
    PortGroupConfig class represents the User's Configuration with a Opaque Regular Expression String that is parsed and handled by PortGroupProvider.
    PortGroupProvider
    PortGroupProvider interface provides all the necessary blueprint for a custom application to implement in order to provide Port Grouping Service.
  • Classes in org.opendaylight.controller.forwardingrulesmanager used by org.opendaylight.controller.forwardingrulesmanager.implementation.data 
    Class and Description
    FlowEntryInstall
    The flow database object representing the flow entry to install on the network node.
  • Classes in org.opendaylight.controller.forwardingrulesmanager used by org.opendaylight.controller.forwardingrulesmanager.internal 
    Class and Description
    FlowConfig
    Configuration Java Object which represents a flow configuration information for Forwarding Rules Manager.
    FlowEntry
    Represents a flow applications request Forwarding Rules Manager to install on a network node.
    IForwardingRulesManager
    Interface that describes methods for installing or removing forwarding rules and to access to the flows database.
    IForwardingRulesManagerAware
    The interface which describes the methods forwarding rules manager will call for notifying the listeners of policy installation updates.
    PortGroup
    PortGroup is a simple data-structure to represent any arbitrary group of ports on a Switch (that is represented using its switch-ID).
    PortGroupChangeListener
    PortGroupChangeListener listens to the PortGroup updates provided by the PortGroupProvider.
    PortGroupConfig
    PortGroupConfig class represents the User's Configuration with a Opaque Regular Expression String that is parsed and handled by PortGroupProvider.
    PortGroupProvider
    PortGroupProvider interface provides all the necessary blueprint for a custom application to implement in order to provide Port Grouping Service.

    Class and Description
